name: Geometry Race
description:
Race in the crazy world of geometry shapes. Aim towards the setting sun and watch out for obstacles that will try to push you off the track.

FEATURES
★ Beautiful bohemian art style
★ Fast paced action with 'just one more try' feel
★ Three distinct worlds full of colorful obstacles and enemies
★ Three wacky music tracks
★ Lots of ships and upgrades
★ Powerups to be picked up along the way
★ Online leaderboards and achievements
